title: I had over 16000 ip before I bought ziggs（4800），then my ip balance became 7207
body: I bought ziggs today， it charged my ip wrong。Before my balance is over 16000，after I bought Ziggs balance is 7207，I refund it got my ip back to 16000，and bought different champion with same price（4800）its happened again. I refund it. restart game bought ziggs again and its happen again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Hiya,

If you're having issues with purchasing Ziggs, or other content, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can better help you. :]
champions are now tax deductible, read the patch notes.
